content.description: Visit ESPN to view the NFL Schedule for the current and previous seasons

headlines.description: — Patrick Mahomes thought for a moment that the Chiefs were headed to overtime. So did Ravens counterpart Lamar Jackson, who had found Isaiah Likely in the back of the end zone with no time left for a touchdown that appeared to tie the game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chiefs hold off Ravens 27-20 when review overturns TD on final play of NFL's season opener

games.name: Baltimore Ravens at Kansas City Chiefs

headlines.description: — Saquon Barkley has been practicing the art of positive thinking since switching teams for the first time in his career.
headlines.shortLinkText: Barkley scores 3 TDs as Eagles beat Packers 34-29 in Brazil. Packers' Love injured in final minute

games.name: Green Bay Packers at Philadelphia Eagles

headlines.description: — With all eyes on the quarterbacks, Chris Boswell's strong right leg stole the spotlight in the season opener.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fields steps in for Wilson, Boswell boots 6 field goals to lead Steelers past Falcons 18-10

headlines.description: — For all the changes the Buffalo Bills had at wide receiver and on defense this offseason, the one big constant that remained was quarterback Josh Allen.
headlines.shortLinkText: Josh Allen throws 2 TD passes and runs for 2 others as Bills rally for 34-28 win over Cardinals

headlines.description: — This wasn't exactly the debut Caleb Williams envisioned. Good thing for him, his defense made just enough plays.
headlines.shortLinkText: Caleb Williams has a rough debut but gets bailed out by Bears' defense in 24-17 win over Titans

headlines.description: — Jacoby Brissett didn't have to be spectacular in his first start for the Patriots.
headlines.shortLinkText: Patriots win Jerod Mayo's debut as coach, beating mistake-prone Bengals 16-10

games.name: New England Patriots at Cincinnati Bengals

headlines.description: — The Houston Texans invested heavily in the offseason in giving C.J. Stroud some additional scoring options.
headlines.shortLinkText: Stefon Diggs, Joe Mixon combine to lead Texans past Colts 29-27 in season opener

headlines.description: — For the Miami Dolphins, the day started with chaos and ended with celebration.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jason Sanders makes 52-yard field goal as time expires and Dolphins rally past Jaguars 20-17

headlines.description: — It took Derek Carr and the Saints' new offense one series to produce a touchdown on an explosive play — and one half to score 30 points.
headlines.shortLinkText: Derek Carr and the Saints rout the Panthers 47-10 in Klint Kubiak's play-calling debut

games.name: Carolina Panthers at New Orleans Saints

headlines.description: — Sam Darnold had one of those super performances at MetLife Stadium that New York Jets fans hoped to see weekly after he was drafted No. 3 overall in 2018.
headlines.shortLinkText: Darnold throws 2 TD passes and Van Ginkel scores on a 1-handed INT as Vikings easily top Giants 28-6

games.name: Minnesota Vikings at New York Giants

headlines.description: — J.K. Dobbins had some of his biggest games in college against Jim Harbaugh.
headlines.shortLinkText: J.K. Dobbins rushes for 135 yards as the Chargers beat the Raiders 22-10 in Jim Harbaugh's debut

games.name: Las Vegas Raiders at Los Angeles Chargers

headlines.description: — The first two plays of Mike Macdonald's career as a head coach started by watching his quarterback get sacked and throw an interception while being hit as he threw.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kenneth Walker III sparks Seahawks rally as Seattle tops Denver 26-20 in Mike Macdonald's debut

headlines.description: — Dak Prescott barely had time to celebrate getting the biggest contract in NFL history before learning it came with a price.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dak Prescott leads Cowboys to 33-17 romp over Browns in opener after getting new 4-year contract

headlines.description: — The Tampa Bay Buccaneers are indisputably Baker Mayfield's team. However, Mike Evans, Chris Godwin and a solid defense are still a big part of their formula for success.
headlines.shortLinkText: Baker Mayfield and Buccaneers rout Commanders 37-20 to spoil Jayden Daniels' debut

games.name: Washington Commanders at Tampa Bay Buccaneers

headlines.description: — The Detroit Lions opened the season by outlasting the Los Angeles Rams with a balanced offense, grinding out yards on the ground and going to the air for some pivotal plays just as they did in their NFC wild-card game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Montgomery's 1-yard touchdown run in OT lifts Lions to 26-20 win over Rams

games.name: Los Angeles Rams at Detroit Lions

headlines.description: — Fill-in back Jordan Mason took top billing in a game hyped as Aaron Rodgers' return.
headlines.shortLinkText: The 49ers spoil Aaron Rodgers' return with a 32-19 win over the Jets

games.name: New York Jets at San Francisco 49ers

content.title: 2024 NFL Schedule

meta.description: Visit ESPN to view the NFL Schedule for the current and previous seasons
meta.label: NFL
meta.title: 2024 NFL Schedule
